ingredients: 1 small jalapeno, seeded and finely chopped (about 1 tablespoon)
1/2 teaspoon dried oregano, ground in palm
1-1/2 pound skirt steak, trimmed of any excess fat
White or yellow corn tortillas, warmed
Additional toppings like lettuce, tomato, black or pinto beans, pico de gallo or green onions are also muy bueno.
